'Mode' is an unincorporated community in Holland Township, Shelby County,
Illinois, United States. Mode is west of Stewardson. Mode has a post office
with ZIP code 62444. [http://www.zipinfo.com/cgi-
local/zipsrch.exe?cnty=cnty&zip=62444&Go=Go ZIP Code Lookup] Mode is
also the home of the Holland Township Building at RR 1 Box 171A, Mode,
Illinois 62444.
categories: Populated places in Shelby County, Illinois
